details:
Numerous security issues have been identified and fixed in Pidgin in
Debian/Wheezy.


* [CVE-2016-2365](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-2365)
MXIT Markup Command Denial of Service Vulnerability
* [CVE-2016-2366](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-2366)
MXIT Table Command Denial of Service Vulnerability
* [CVE-2016-2367](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-2367)
MXIT Avatar Length Memory Disclosure Vulnerability
* [CVE-2016-2368](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-2368)
MXIT g\_snprintf Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
* [CVE-2016-2369](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-2369)
MXIT CP\_SOCK\_REC\_TERM Denial of Service Vulnerability
* [CVE-2016-2370](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-2370)
MXIT Custom Resource Denial of Service Vulnerability
* [CVE-2016-2371](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-2371)
MXIT Extended Profiles Code Execution Vulnerability
* [CVE-2016-2372](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-2372)
MXIT File Transfer Length Memory Disclosure Vulnerability
* [CVE-2016-2373](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-2373)
MXIT Contact Mood Denial of Service Vulnerability
* [CVE-2016-2374](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-2374)
MXIT MultiMX Message Code Execution Vulnerability
* [CVE-2016-2375](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-2375)
MXIT Suggested Contacts Memory Disclosure Vulnerability
* [CVE-2016-2376](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-2376)
MXIT read stage 0x3 Code Execution Vulnerability
* [CVE-2016-2377](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-2377)
MXIT HTTP Content-Length Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
* [CVE-2016-2378](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-2378)
MXIT get\_utf8\_string Code Execution Vulnerability
* [CVE-2016-2380](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-2380)
MXIT mxit\_convert\_markup\_tx Information Leak Vulnerability
* [CVE-2016-4323](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-4323)
MXIT Splash Image Arbitrary File Overwrite Vulnerability


For Debian 7 Wheezy, these problems have been fixed in version
2.10.10-1~deb7u2.


We recommend that you upgrade your pidgin packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
